body_html:
I resolved this issue by running:

$ conda install -c pytorch pytorch-nightly-cpu
$ conda install -c fastai torchvision-nightly-cpu
$ conda install -c intel openmp
$ conda env update -f environment-cpu.yml
$ conda activate fastai-cpu
export NUM_CORES=40
$ export MKL_NUM_THREADS=$NUM_CORES OMP_NUM_THREADS=$NUM_CORES

How I resolved slow PyTorch on Anaconda
Note, I was using fast.ai as a frontend, but it shouldn't matter.

body:
I resolved this issue by running:
```
$ conda install -c pytorch pytorch-nightly-cpu
$ conda install -c fastai torchvision-nightly-cpu
$ conda install -c intel openmp
$ conda env update -f environment-cpu.yml
$ conda activate fastai-cpu
export NUM_CORES=40
$ export MKL_NUM_THREADS=$NUM_CORES OMP_NUM_THREADS=$NUM_CORES
```

[How I resolved slow PyTorch on Anaconda](https://pmchojnacki.wordpress.com/2018/10/07/slow-pytorch-cpu-performance/)
Note, I was using fast.ai as a frontend, but it shouldn't matter.
